languages.text: С годами, впрочем, многие в свите {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости заметили странные перемены поведения. Вольный Торговец вершил{mf||а} правосудие, будто не нуждаясь в сне и пище, но сохраняя молодость и телесную силу. Говорили, что единственным блюдом, угодным {mf|ем|ей}, было мозговое вещество осужденных преступников — деликатес, с которым {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость познакомила Инцендия Чорда.

Over the years, many in the Rogue Trader's retinue noticed strange changes in {mf|his|her} behaviour. With no apparent need for sleep or food, the Rogue Trader delivered justice while retaining {mf|his|her} youth and physical strength. Some said that the only dish {mf|he|she} would eat was the marrow of convicted criminals — a delicacy introduced to {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} by Incendia Chorda.
languages.original_text: С годами, впрочем, многие в свите {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости заметили странные перемены поведения. Вольный Торговец вершил{mf||а} правосудие, будто не нуждаясь в сне и пище, но сохраняя молодость и телесную силу. Говорили, что единственным блюдом, угодным {mf|ем|ей}, было мозговое вещество осужденных преступников — деликатес, с которым {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость познакомила Инцендия Чорда.

traits.locale_text: With passing years, though, many in the retinue of the Rogue Trader, have noticed strange changes in {mf|his|her} behaviour. The Rogue Trader delivered justice, not needing sleep or food, yet retaining {mf|his|her} youth and physical strength. Some said that the only dish {mf|he|she} fancied was the marrow of convicted criminals — a delicacy that Incendia Chorda introduced to {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}.

With passing years, though, many in the retinue of the Rogue Trader, have noticed strange changes in {mf|his|her} behaviour. The Rogue Trader delivered justice, not needing sleep or food, yet retaining {mf|his|her} youth and physical strength. Some said that the only dish {mf|he|she} fancied was the marrow of convicted criminals — a delicacy that Incendia Chorda introduced to {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}.

Over the years, many in the Rogue Trader's retinue noticed strange changes in {mf|his|her} behaviour. Some said that the only dish {mf|he|she} would eat was the marrow of convicted criminals — a delicacy introduced to {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} by Incendia Chorda.

Some said that the only dish {mf|he|she} would eat was the marrow of convicted criminals — a delicacy introduced to {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} by Incendia Chorda.

With no apparent need for sleep or food, the Rogue Trader delivered justice while retaining {mf|his|her} youth and physical strength. Some said that the only dish {mf|he|she} would eat was the marrow of convicted criminals — a delicacy introduced to {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} by Incendia Chorda.

Over the years, many in the Rogue Trader's retinue noticed strange changes in {mf|his|her} behaviour. With no apparent need for sleep or food, the Rogue Trader delivered justice while retaining {mf|his|her} youth and physical strength. Some said that the only dish {mf|he|she} would eat was the marrow of convicted criminals — a delicacy introduced to {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} by Incendia Chorda.

languages.text: 多年来，行商浪人的许多随从都注意到，{mf|他|她}的行为发生了古怪的变化。行商浪人似乎不需要睡眠，也不需要进食。{mf|他|她}在积极伸张正义的同时，而又始终保持着年轻与活力，{mf|他|她}唯一会吃的东西，便是罪犯的骨髓，这是因森蒂娅·库尔达介绍给{mf|他|她}的美食。
languages.original_text: Over the years, many in the Rogue Trader's retinue noticed strange changes in {mf|his|her} behaviour. With no apparent need for sleep or food, the Rogue Trader delivered justice while retaining {mf|his|her} youth and physical strength. Some said that the only dish {mf|he|she} would eat was the marrow of convicted criminals — a delicacy introduced to {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} by Incendia Chorda.

traits.locale_text: 多年来，行商浪人的许多随从都注意到，{mf|他|她}的行为发生了古怪的变化。行商浪人不需要睡眠，也不需要进食。{mf|他|她}在积极伸张正义的同时，而又始终保持着年轻与活力，{mf|他|她}唯一会吃的东西，便是罪犯的骨髓，这是因森蒂娅·库尔达介绍给{mf|他|她}的美食。

languages.text: Im Laufe der Jahre bemerkten viele Mitglieder des Gefolges {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} merkwürdige Veränderungen an {mf|seinem|ihrem} Verhalten. Offenbar ohne je Schlaf oder Nahrung zu benötigen, sorgte {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} unaufhörlich für Gerechtigkeit und behielt {mf|seine|ihre} Jugend und körperliche Stärke unverändert bei. Manche sagten, {mf|er|sie} würde nur eines essen, nämlich das Rückenmark verurteilter Verbrecher — eine Delikatesse, auf deren Geschmack Incendia Chorda {mf|seine|ihre} {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} angeblich gebracht hatte.
languages.original_text: Over the years, many in the Rogue Trader's retinue noticed strange changes in {mf|his|her} behaviour. With no apparent need for sleep or food, the Rogue Trader delivered justice while retaining {mf|his|her} youth and physical strength. Some said that the only dish {mf|he|she} would eat was the marrow of convicted criminals — a delicacy introduced to {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} by Incendia Chorda.

traits.locale_text: Im Laufe der Jahre bemerkten viele Mitglieder des Gefolges {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} merkwürdige Veränderungen an {mf|seinem|ihrem} Verhalten. Ohne Schlaf oder Nahrung zu benötigen, sorgte {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} unaufhörlich für Gerechtigkeit und behielt {mf|seine|ihre} Jugend und körperliche Stärke unverändert bei. Manche sagten, {mf|er|sie} würde nur eines essen, nämlich das Rückenmark verurteilter Verbrecher — eine Delikatesse, auf deren Geschmack Incendia Chorda {mf|seine|ihre} {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} angeblich gebracht hatte.

languages.text: Au fil des ans, plusieurs membres de l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} remarquèrent d'étranges changements dans son comportement. N'ayant apparemment besoin ni de dormir ni de manger, {mf|il|elle} dispensait la justice tout en conservant sa jeunesse et sa force. Certains prétendaient que la seule nourriture qu'{mf|il|elle} consommait était la moelle des criminels condamnés, un mets qu'Incendia Chorda lui avait fait découvrir.
languages.original_text: Over the years, many in the Rogue Trader's retinue noticed strange changes in {mf|his|her} behaviour. With no apparent need for sleep or food, the Rogue Trader delivered justice while retaining {mf|his|her} youth and physical strength. Some said that the only dish {mf|he|she} would eat was the marrow of convicted criminals — a delicacy introduced to {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} by Incendia Chorda.

traits.locale_text: Au fil des ans, plusieurs membres de l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} remarquèrent d'étranges changements dans son comportement. Sans avoir besoin de dormir ni de manger, {mf|il|elle} dispensait la justice tout en conservant sa jeunesse et sa force. Certains prétendaient que la seule nourriture qu'{mf|il|elle} consommait était la moelle des criminels condamnés, un mets qu’Incendia Chorda lui avait fait découvrir.

languages.text: Con el paso de los años, muchos miembros del séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente se fijaron en los peculiares cambios en su comportamiento. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán hacía justicia sin necesidad aparente de comer ni beber, y parecía no perder la juventud ni la fuerza ante el paso del tiempo. Algunos decían que la única comida que consumía era el tuétano de los criminales convictos; una delicia que le enseñó Incendia Chorda.
languages.original_text: Over the years, many in the Rogue Trader's retinue noticed strange changes in {mf|his|her} behaviour. With no apparent need for sleep or food, the Rogue Trader delivered justice while retaining {mf|his|her} youth and physical strength. Some said that the only dish {mf|he|she} would eat was the marrow of convicted criminals — a delicacy introduced to {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} by Incendia Chorda.

traits.locale_text: Con el paso de los años, muchos miembros del séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente se fijaron en los peculiares cambios en su comportamiento. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán hacía justicia sin necesidad de comer ni beber, y parecía no perder la juventud ni la fuerza ante el paso del tiempo. Algunos decían que la única comida que consumía era el tuétano de los criminales convictos; una delicia que le enseñó Incendia Chorda.

languages.text: 長い年月を経て、自由開拓者の従者の多くが{mf|彼|彼女}の行動の奇妙な変化に気づいた。睡眠も食事も特に必要としていないらしい自由開拓者は、若さと肉体の強さを保ったまま正義を遂行していた。一部の者は、{mf|彼|彼女}が食べる唯一の料理は有罪判決を受けた犯罪者の骨髄であり、それはインセンディア・チョーダが陛下に紹介した珍味であると口にしていた。
languages.original_text: Over the years, many in the Rogue Trader's retinue noticed strange changes in {mf|his|her} behaviour. With no apparent need for sleep or food, the Rogue Trader delivered justice while retaining {mf|his|her} youth and physical strength. Some said that the only dish {mf|he|she} would eat was the marrow of convicted criminals — a delicacy introduced to {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} by Incendia Chorda.

traits.locale_text: 長い年月を経て、自由開拓者の従者の多くが{mf|彼|彼女}の行動の奇妙な変化に気づいた。睡眠も食事も特に必要としていないらしい自由開拓者は、若さと肉体の強さを保ったまま正義を遂行していた。一部の者は、{mf|彼|彼女}が食べる唯一の料理は有罪判決を受けた犯罪者の骨髄であり、それはインセンディア・チョーダが陛下に紹介した珍味であると口にしていた。

languages.text: Maiyetindeki birçok kişi, yıllar içerisinde Hür Tacir'in davranışında bazı tuhaf değişimler yaşandığını fark etti. Uyumaya ya da yemek yemeye ihtiyaç duymuyor gibi görünen Hür Tacir, gençliğini ve fiziksel gücünü koruyarak hükmünü sürdürüyordu. Bazıları yediği tek şeyin, mahkûm edilen suçluların ilikleri olduğunu ve ona bunu yapmayı öğretenin de {mf|Lord|Leydi} İncendia Chorda Hazretleri olduğunu söylüyordu.
languages.original_text: Over the years, many in the Rogue Trader's retinue noticed strange changes in {mf|his|her} behaviour. With no apparent need for sleep or food, the Rogue Trader delivered justice while retaining {mf|his|her} youth and physical strength. Some said that the only dish {mf|he|she} would eat was the marrow of convicted criminals — a delicacy introduced to {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} by Incendia Chorda.

traits.locale_text: Maiyetindeki birçok kişi yıllar içerisinde Hür Tacir'in davranışında bazı tuhaf değişimler meydana geldiğini fark etti. Hür Tacir uyumaya ya da yemek yemeye ihtiyaç duymuyor gibi görünüyordu ve gençliğini ve fiziksel gücünü koruyarak hükmediyordu. Bazıları yediği tek şeyin, mahkûm edilen suçluların ilikleri olduğunu, ona bunu yapmayı öğretinin de {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri İncendia Chorda olduğunu söylüyordu.
